channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large hole in road very deep and dangerous, 17th January
item.description:
Large hole in road outside 74 lewis road da16, I hit it in the dark with my car , burst tyre and damaged wheel and suspension will be requesting a claim form from LB of Bexley on Monday

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lewis Road, Welling, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter, 17th January
item.description:
Litter bin is not emptied often enough. Full bags of litter are often stored beside the bin and foxes split open the bags and spread the litter again.

item.title: What is the role of the staff in this park?, 17th January
item.description:
I have reported this rubbish location many months ago and it's still continues to be a problem. It seems like people that work here are either insufficient or do not go out far enough and look in the Woods for such things so it is up to the members of the public that used the park to basically do the job instead.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Beckenham Place Park, Beckenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside infront of Scrivens Opticians, 17th January
item.description:
These three pavement block are uneven and moving down each time people step on them. More so I have seen daily elderly individuals stumbling when they step on them, the most recent 17 Jan 2026. 6 months ago a lady stumbled on them and was left bloodied to the knees, chin and hands.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 277, Kentish Town Road, Kentish Town, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
